product_name: CycleAware Tour De Joy Handlebar Purse - Girls'
long_description: A purse that carries just as well on a handlebar as in hand, the CycleAware Tour De Joy handlebar purse offers style and convenient carrying of essentials, on- and off-bike. Synthetic leather construction withstands everyday use while maintaining good looks. Top flap secures with magnetic snap; mirror is sewn into underside of flap. Internal zip pocket secures smaller essentials; clear window holds ID or other cards. Straps conveniently secure around handlebar when it's time to ride; when the ride is over, it's easy to unclasp the straps and take the purse along. Reflective hits increase visibility in low light.
short_description: A purse that carries just as well on a handlebar as in hand, the CycleAware Tour De Joy handlebar purse offers style and convenient carrying of essentials, on- and off-bike.
